author: vmassol
msg: print "in CVS" for unreleased versions instead of "released on in CVS"...

author: vmassol
msg: - Replaced "fixes-bug" by "issue" as it's about issues not bugs...
- Point the issue links to the Cactus JIRA (instead of bugzilla)
- Finished converting bugzilla IDs to JIRA IDs

author: vmassol
msg: - The JettyTestSetup class now checks if the Jetty server is already started and only starts it if it isn't running. It also does not stops it if it was running before JettyTestSetup was called. This is useful when you have a master test suite and when you also wish to run your tests one by one.

- Refactored ServletConfiguration/JspConfiguration/FilterConfiguration by transforming them into interfaces. This was required to be able to mock them and perform unit test of the modified JettyTestSetup
- Added Jetty.jar to the framework build (now required for the unit tests)
